project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Research and select a suitable public weather API
Implement functionality to fetch current weather information for a city
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a command-line interface for user input (specifying city)
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correct functionality
